name: Remorhaz
description: A massive, centipede-like creature covered in icy-blue plates, capable of generating intense heat that causes the air around it to shimmer.
memorable: Remorhaz can swallow victims whole and is known for its ability to inflict continuous damage with its Heated Body ability.
goals: To ambush and consume prey in cold, arctic regions.
relations: Often exists in cold environments, could be encountered with other arctic predators.
environment: Cold, arctic regions, capable of burrowing through snow and ice.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution scores, immunity to cold and fire damage, can grapple multiple creatures at once.
weaknesses: Very low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, limited agility due to average Dexterity.
attacks: Utilizes a powerful bite attack and constrict action, dealing both piercing and fire damage, with the ability to swallow foes.
most_powerful_ability: Heated Body causes fire damage to anyone grappling or hitting it in close range, increasing if bloodied.
senses: Possesses darkvision and tremorsense, each extending 60 feet, enhancing awareness of its environment.
skills: Lacks notable skill proficiencies, limiting its effectiveness outside combat scenarios.
additional_information: Can create tunnels through ice and snow.
Resistant to exhaustion and fear effects.
Can vent heat to potentially exhaust nearby creatures.
Swallowed creatures take continuous acid damage.
Can grapple up to three creatures at once.
test_queries: creature that swallows its prey whole
arctic monster that generates intense heat
huge centipede-like creature with fiery attacks
predator known for grappling and swallowing
